Header.title: Nigel O'Connor
Header.paragraph: You shouldn't have to live with pain. I am here to help you get back to feeling great

About.paragraph: Providing a highly rated and sought after service for over 15 years to the people of Tramore and beyond. You are in safe hands, whether it's a graded rehab program, manipulation, dry needling, deep tissue massage or just some advice, I am here to help
Why2: I love to help people get better

Services.name: Client History
Services.text: Everyones body has a different story to tell, it's vital we find out all the important events in your life that has lead to this current state

Services.name: Assessment
Services.text: What's working good, what's working not so good, what caused pain, what eases pain. Now we start to see the picture

Services.name: Treatment Plan
Services.text: Agree on a treatment plan sepcific to you and your lifestyle

Services.name: Hands-On
Services.text: The best pair of hands in Waterford if that's what you need/want

Services.name: Other Modalities
Services.text: Dry Needling, Manipulation, Ultra-Sound, Interferrential, Massage, Muscle Enery Technique, Cross Fibre Friction

Services.name: Conditions Treated
Services.text: Running & other sports injuries, back pain, neck and whiplash problems, shoulder problems, stress related conditions, tension headaches and joint strains.

Testimonials.text: "Always professional, never brings you back for extra sessions"
Testimonials.name: Ger Scully

Testimonials.text: "Was told I should never run again, now I am running pain free."
Testimonials.name: Brian Swaby

Testimonials.text: "Have used Nigel for many years with my troublesome back. Always a great help."
Testimonials.name: Pat Power

Testimonials.text: "Had knee issues caused by running, got a rehab programme which got me back pain free."
Testimonials.name: Gabrielle Power

Testimonials.text: "Get regular rub downs, best pair of hands around. Also fixed any niggles I had training for Iron Man."
Testimonials.name: Kenny Lonergan

Testimonials.text: "Very knowleable, felt comfortable and at ease right away, really listened to my story and fixed my issue in 1 session."
Testimonials.name: Mary Scanlon

Contact.address: 18 The Strand, Somerville, Tramore, Co.Waterford X91PK38
